org.fujion.client

Class WebJarLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.client.WebJarLocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    public class WebJarLocator
extends Object
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Locates all web jars on the class path, parses their configuration data (supports classic, NPM, and Bower formats), and generates the necessary initialization code for SystemJS. Note that the classic format has been extended to handle both RequireJS and SystemJS configuration data.

    • Method Summary

      Finds a web jar given its unique name.
      String getWebJarInit()
      Returns the initialization data for the SystemJS config call.
      void setApplicationContext(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext applicationContext)
